lead_paragraph: The video appears aimed at making it clear that the assailants — nearly all of whom had European passports — had been carrying out atrocities in the group’s name long before their return into Europe.
snippet: The video appears aimed at making it clear that the assailants — nearly all of whom had European passports — had been carrying out atrocities in the group’s name long before their return into Europe.

headline.main: ISIS Video Appears to Show Paris Assailants Earlier in Syria and Iraq
headline.print_headline: ISIS Video Appears to Show Paris Assailants Earlier in Syria and Iraq

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

abstract: Islamic State releases video depicting suspects of November 2015 Paris attacks carrying out executions in Syria and Iraq; if confirmed, video would substantiate idea that perpetrators were core members of terrorist group; video threatens attack on Britain.
